text: Walk, Don't Run is a 1966 American romantic comedy movie directed by Charles Walters and starring Cary Grant, Samantha Eggar, Jim Hutton, John Standing, George Takei, Ted Hartley. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was a remake of the 1943 movie The More the Merrier. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1966 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters Category:Movies set in Tokyo Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Walk, Don't Run
